pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Bainimarama of the Fiji Islands | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with Prime Minister Bainimarama of the Fiji Islands.

The Prime Minister thanked Prime Minister Bainimarama for attending the Montreal Ministerial on Climate Action.  

In the run-up to Fiji’s presidency of the 23rd Conference of the Parties (COP23) in Bonn, Germany, from November 6 to 17, the two leaders took stock of progress on climate issues since the last Conference of the Parties.

The two leaders also discussed the climate vulnerabilities faced by small island developing states. The Prime Minister announced that the Canadian government would contribute $1.4 million towards Fiji’s COP23 presidency.‎
